column1: In  support  of his  4th  Ground  of Appeal,  counsel  for  the  Accused-Appellant  submitted  that  the
Learned  Trial  Judge  had  failed  to  evaluate  his  defence  with  the  prosecution  version  to  assess
what version was more probable. According to the dock  statement of the  Accused as  well  as  the
position  taken  up  him  during  cross  examination  of prosecution  witnesses,  was

column2: arrested at Bambalapitiya when he  went to meet a Pakistani national. Appellant further submitted

column1: the fact that recovery of 12  similar packets at Hotel  Lakmali on the same day confirms the above
